Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 防具屋「獣王のおきて」
Entry.EnglishText: Armor Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 武器屋「烈刃」
Entry.EnglishText: Weapon Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカ
Entry.EnglishText: Capital City Balka

Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカ・装備品屋
Entry.EnglishText: Capital City Balka - Weapon Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 装備品屋
Entry.EnglishText: Weapon Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな素敵なドレスの上に 似合う防具なんてないわよ？
Entry.EnglishText: What sort of armor would look good on a nice dress like that?

Entry.JapaneseText: カワイイんだから、 武器よりオシャレ、でしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: It's so cute, much more fashionable than weapons, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: うちは防具屋ですけど、 何をお探しですか？
Entry.EnglishText: We are an armor shop, though. What are you looking for?

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃい……ますか？
Entry.EnglishText: Wel...come?

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃいませ。
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome.

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃい……ませ。
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome...

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃいませ。
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome.

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃいませ。
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 防具を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Armor Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: また、どーぞ…… 別に来なくてもいいけど。
Entry.EnglishText: Come aga-... Actually, don't come back.

Entry.JapaneseText: また来てくださいね。
Entry.EnglishText: Come back again!

Entry.JapaneseText: また来てくださいね。
Entry.EnglishText: Come back again!

Entry.JapaneseText: 新入荷の品がありますけど……？ 見たいなら、どーぞ……
Entry.EnglishText: We have some new inventory, but...? Well, if you'd like to take a look, go...

Entry.JapaneseText: はぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: Hah...

Entry.JapaneseText: 新入荷の品がありますよ。 買っていってくださいな。
Entry.EnglishText: We have some new inventory. Please go ahead and buy some.

Entry.JapaneseText: 毎度です、また来てください。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you for your patronage, please come again.

Entry.JapaneseText: 新入荷の品がありますよ。 買っていってくださいな。
Entry.EnglishText: We have some new inventory. Please go ahead and buy some.

Entry.JapaneseText: 毎度です、また来てください。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you for your patronage, please come again.

Entry.JapaneseText: また……来てもいいですけど、 来なくてもいいですよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Come aga...you're free to come again, but you don't have to.

Entry.JapaneseText: 毎度です、また来てください。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you for your patronage, please come again.

Entry.JapaneseText: また来てくださいね。
Entry.EnglishText: Come back again!

Entry.JapaneseText: あんまりガジュマに うちの商品を買ってほしく ないのよね……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't want too many Gajuma buying our products...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマと同じ空気を吸ってると 思うと耐えられないわ！
Entry.EnglishText: I can't stand the thought of even breathing the same air as a Gajuma.
Entry.Notes: maybe use "with a" instead of "as a"

Entry.JapaneseText: 引っ越したいけどお金もないし。 あっちのガジュマが出て行って くれるのを待ってるんだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I want to relocate, but I don't have the money to do so. I'm hoping that Gajuma over there will move out instead...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマを差別すると 店の営業許可を取り消すって お達しがあったのよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Y'know, I received a notice that if I discriminate against Gajuma customers, they'll revoke my business license...

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、あなたにも防具は 売ってあげるけど……
Entry.EnglishText: That's the only reason I'll sell you armor too...
Entry.Notes: More literally might be "as such" or "Therefore" in the beginning, but I feel this is better at conveying his reluctance to sell to Eugene.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマを差別すると 店の営業許可を取り消すって お達しがあったの……
Entry.EnglishText: I received a notice that if I discriminate against Gajuma customers, they'll revoke my business license...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、ヒューマの仲間たちからは 絶対に売るなって言われるし……
Entry.EnglishText: But my Huma friends keep telling me to stop selling to them...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの客が来ない事を ひたすら願ってるのよ……
Entry.EnglishText: I just hope we don't get any Gajuma customers...

Entry.JapaneseText: 今の世の中、あなたみたいな か弱い子にこそ、防具が必要よ。
Entry.EnglishText: With the current state of the world, it's kids like you who need protective equipment.

Entry.JapaneseText: お安くしておくわよ。 ひとついかが？
Entry.EnglishText: I'll throw in a discount. Do you want it?

Entry.JapaneseText: 本当はガジュマなんかに…… い、いえ……こっちの話……
Entry.EnglishText: You're a Gajuma, so I don't really... Oh, uh, never mind me...

Entry.JapaneseText: ゆっくり見ていってね……
Entry.EnglishText: Take your time and have a look...

Entry.JapaneseText: あなた、この街の人じゃ なさそうだけど、あまり外を 出歩かないほうがいいわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: It doesn't look like you're from this town, but you should still refrain from going out too often.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマと見れば、ガジュマに 嫌がらせされるから、気をつけて。
Entry.EnglishText: If the Gajuma see you together with the Huma, they'll harass you, so be careful.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマを差別すると 店の営業許可を取り消すって お達しがあったのよ……
Entry.EnglishText: I received a notice that if I discriminate against Gajuma customers, they'll revoke my business license...

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、あなたにも防具は 売ってあげるけど……
Entry.EnglishText: That's the only reason I'll sell you armor too...
Entry.Notes: More literally might be "as such" or "Therefore" in the beginning, but I feel this is better at conveying his reluctance to sell to Eugene.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマを差別するなって お上から言われてるけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I've been instructed by the higher-ups not to discriminate against Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: 今、この街じゃ、ヒューマのほうが 差別されているようなものよ…… どうにも納得がいかないわ！
Entry.EnglishText: But now, it's more like the Huma are being discriminated against in this city... I can't agree with this!

Entry.JapaneseText: あっちの武器屋さんに言われたの。 いがみ合ってる場合じゃないって。
Entry.EnglishText: The weapon shop owner over there spoke with me. He said we shouldn't be quarreling with one another right now.

Entry.JapaneseText: 互いの問題点はこれから じっくり話し合えばいい。 今は、この危機を乗り越えようって。
Entry.EnglishText: That we should discuss our problems with each other in more detail later. And that for now, we should just get through this crisis.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだか、嬉しいっていうか…… それでいいんだ、って思ったの。
Entry.EnglishText: Somehow, I was actually happy to hear him say that...and I thought that things would be all right.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうぞ見ていってください。 冷やかしも大歓迎です。
Entry.EnglishText: Please take a look. Window shopping is also permitted.

Entry.JapaneseText: コ、コワイ…… 何の音……？
Entry.EnglishText: S-scary... What is that sound?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの女に売るための なまくらな武器はうちにはないよ！ さっさと帰った！
Entry.EnglishText: We don't hold any wimpy weapons in our shop to sell to some Huma woman! Hurry up and leave!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだね、なんか武器が 欲しいのかい？
Entry.EnglishText: What, you want some kind of weapon?

Entry.JapaneseText: でもあんたのような か細い女の子じゃ、 剣も振れないだろう？
Entry.EnglishText: But a girl as flimsy as yourself can't even wield a sword, can you?

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃーい！
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome!

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃ……い……
Entry.EnglishText: Wel...come...

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃーい！
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome!

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃ……い……
Entry.EnglishText: Wel...come...

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃーい！
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 武器を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Weapons Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: またいらっしゃーい！
Entry.EnglishText: Come back anytime!

Entry.JapaneseText: もう来なくていいからな！
Entry.EnglishText: No need to come back here!

Entry.JapaneseText: またいらっしゃーい！
Entry.EnglishText: Come back anytime!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマ大歓迎ー！
Entry.EnglishText: Any Gajuma is welcome here!

Entry.JapaneseText: 気に入ったのはあったかね。 ガジュマはまたいらっしゃーい！
Entry.EnglishText: Did you enjoy your time here? Any Gajuma is welcome to come back!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは……えーと…… 見たいなら見れば……？
Entry.EnglishText: A Huma, here... err, uh... If you want to look, go there...?

Entry.JapaneseText: はいはい、サイナラ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, yeah, sayonara.

Entry.JapaneseText: 新しい品が入ってるよ。 見ていっておくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: We've got some new items in stock. Go and have a look.

Entry.JapaneseText: 気に入ったのはあったかね。 またいらっしゃーい！
Entry.EnglishText: Did you find something you liked? Come back again!

Entry.JapaneseText: 新しい品が入ってるけど…… 見たいなら見れば……？
Entry.EnglishText: We've got some new stock, but... Well, if you want to look...

Entry.JapaneseText: はいはい、サイナラ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, yeah, sayonara.

Entry.JapaneseText: 新しい品が入ってるよ。 見ていっておくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: We've got some new items in stock. Go and have a look.

Entry.JapaneseText: 気に入ったのはあったかね。 またいらっしゃーい！
Entry.EnglishText: Did you find something you liked? Come back again!

Entry.JapaneseText: またいらっしゃーい！
Entry.EnglishText: Come back anytime!

Entry.JapaneseText: うちも商売だからね、 武器が売れればおお助かりさ。
Entry.EnglishText: We are a business, so nomally we'd be happy whenever we're able to sell weapons...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも最近は、もめごとばかり。 そんな事に、うちの武器を 使われるのもいやだしさ……
Entry.EnglishText: But lately there's been a lot of quarrels. We don't want our weapons to be used for those kinds of situations...

Entry.JapaneseText: 客には気をつけているよ。
Entry.EnglishText: So I'm being very careful about who I'm selling to.
Entry.Notes: Need to check if this follows right after the previous line (I believe it does, but needs to be verified)

Entry.JapaneseText: いくら商売とはいえ、 ヒューマにはあまり武器を 売りたかないね。
Entry.EnglishText: No matter how much business I would make, I don't want to sell too many weapons to the Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: どのヒューマを見ても、 ガジュマが憎いって顔をしてる。 襲われたらかなわんからな……
Entry.EnglishText: Every Huma I see has that look on their face that says they hate Gajuma. I don't want to be assaulted by my own weapons.

Entry.JapaneseText: 本音を言うと、ヒューマに 武器を売りたくないんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'll be honest, I don't want to sell any weapons to you Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、うかつに差別をすると ミルハウスト将軍の下の監察官が 来て、厳しく取り締まられるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: But if I carelessly discriminate, the officers under General Milhaust will crack down on my shop.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマに、ウチの武器は オススメできないね！
Entry.EnglishText: I wouldn't recommend any weapons to Huma like yourself.

Entry.JapaneseText: できるだけ買わないでくれると、 こっちは大助かりさ！
Entry.EnglishText: It would be a huge favor to us if you bought as little as you can!

Entry.JapaneseText: ここんところ、街での争いも 減ったように見えるんだがね、 俺は安心しちゃいないよ……
なぜなら、ウチの武器が 今まで以上にたくさん 売れているんだ……
そのうち何か起こるよ。 あんたも気をつけたほうがいい。
ヒューマは武器を買う前に、 防具を買ったほうがいいんじゃ ないのかい!?
いや、特に意味はないがな。 ふん……
今は、種族同士がいがみ 合ってる場合じゃない……
そんな気がするんだよ…… 協力し合おう……明日のために。
うちの商品は天下一品だ。 見たらきっと欲しくなるよ。
何が起こってるんだ？ あんた、知ってるか？
<speed:0>『獣面のヨロイ（非売品）』 獅子王と呼ばれ、武術に秀でていた 第十六代ガガーイ王の使っていた、 胸にライオンのレリーフが入った 大迫力のヨロイ。
